message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you.  I'm asking for $18,000. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I believe I can find something similar within my budget. Would you consider lowering the price to $15,000?
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $18,000 is already a competitive price for a product of this quality.  Could you meet me halfway at $16,500?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I am still looking to keep my spending below $12,000. Could we possibly negotiate down to $15,000?
